thought: To start the workflow, I need to define the trigger and the necessary actions for reading Google Sheets, calling AI completion, and sending Gmail messages.
plan: Define an action to read data from Google Sheets with the provided documentId and sheetName.
Define an action to call aiCompletion for classification.
Define an action to send Gmail messages.
criticism: Currently, no functions are defined, so no workflow can run. Defining these functions is necessary to implement the workflow.

functions.comments: Trigger the workflow manually by user clicking the button.
